name: Merrell Jungle Moc Shoes - Children to Youths
description: Tough enough for the jungle, but ready for the school yard. Merrell downsized their popular adult-sized Jungle Moc for the next generation of explorers.Easy slip-on design leaves more time for playing.Durable suede upper.Anti-bacterial infused lining keeps feet fresh.M Select™ GRIP, non-marking tread provides great traction on a variety of surfaces.
